channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spain orders largest peacetime troop deployment after flooding
item.description: The new deployments will include 5,000 soldiers and 5,000 members of the police and Civil Guards, bringing the total number in the affected areas to a...

item.title: After Deadly Floods in Spain, Thousands of Volunteers Help in Recovery Effort
item.description: As the country reels from a flood that has left at least 211 people dead, ordinary citizens have flocked to devastated areas to help clean, donate and...

item.description: A radio station in Poland fired its on-air talent and brought in A.I.-generated presenters. An outcry over a purported chat with a Nobel laureate quic...

item.title: New York City declares drought watch and asks residents to conserve water—’Mother Nature is in charge’
item.description: Just 0.01 inches of rain fell last month on the city's Central Park, where October normally brings about 4.4 inches of precipitation.

item.title: Israel Says Elite Naval Commandos Abducted Hezbollah Operative
item.description: It appeared to be the deepest Israeli operation by sea and ground inside Lebanon during the current war.

item.title: Apple darling Goodnotes expands to provide AI tools for ‘less technically inclined teachers’
item.description: The winner of Apple's 2022 "iPad App of the Year" award turned one of its meetings rooms into a mock classroom to figure out what teachers needed.

item.title: Kamala Harris Will Make Surprise Appearance on ‘Saturday Night Live’ Tonight
item.description: Appearing in a mirror opposite her longtime impersonator, the vice president gave a little positive encouragement to her comedic reflection.

item.title: Iran supreme leader says ‘crushing response’ awaits US, Israel
item.description: Without offering more detail, Khamenei said hostile actions against the Islamic Republic “wouldn’t be forgotten.”

item.title: Here’s exactly how much protein you need if you work out
item.description: Your needs largely depend on your fitness goals, but you may not need to go as protein-heavy as you think.
